participant_1.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

participant_2.background: i am pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

content.text: Good there Will be a promotion next year as senior pa with one more kid
that is awesome! what do you do?
